changeSet.author: Taiwo Gboyegun

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(table_name) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name = 'dsd_outlet';

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE dsd_outlet ( id bigint NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 CACHE 1 ), im varchar(50), state VARCHAR(255), lga VARCHAR(255), name varchar(255), dsd_type varchar(255), archived integer, CONSTRAINT pk_dsd_outlet PRIMARY KEY (id) )
